channel.title: Character save problem
channel.description: Alright... So I have been using the 508 Tukkulscape client and its GREAT! except when I turn it off then back on it deletes the character main saves. Could somebody help me prevent this? I don't know whats wrong if you wan't to contact me add my msn jarhoops@hotmail.com I will also keep an eye on this thread!

i use to us tokkul and it didnt do that so idk mate
